short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fix the bottom scrollbar hiding pre formated text/code on stack overfow

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a chrome extension that fixes an issue where the bottom scrollbar blocks the last line of stack overflow pre text or blocks of code
